**Input fields needed**

     e.g.
     - Hemoglobin (g/dL)
     - Hematocrit (%)
     - WBC count (×10³/µL)
     - Date collected -->

**Logic or calculation (if any)**

     e.g. Flag hemoglobin < 12 g/dL as low; derive MCV = (Hct / RBC) × 10 -->

     e.g. table row, chart point, summary card, inline text -->
